videooutput: Can be selected from NTSC and PAL
exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure and exposure compensation (-2.0 - +2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)
weight: Approx. 200 g (7.1 oz) (including battery and SD memory card)
meteringmode: Matrix, center-weighted, spot (when digital zoom is 2x or higher)
chargingtime: Approx. 3 h and 50 min (when using Charging AC Adapter EH-70P and when no charge remains)
speed: 1/1500 - 1 s 1/4000 - 1/120 s (Continuous H: 120 fps) 1/4000 - 1/60 s (Continuous H: 60 fps) 4 s (Fireworks show scene mode)
ioterminal: Audio/video output; digital I/O (USB) HDMI micro connector (Type D) (HDMI output)
hdmioutput: Can be selected from Auto, 480p, 720p, and 1080i
selftimer: Durations of 2 or 10 seconds can be selected
continuousshooting: Single (default setting), Continuous H (up to 5 pictures are continuously shot at a rate of about 7.5 frames per second), Continuous L (about 31 pictures are continuously shot at a rate of about 1.9 fps), Pre-shooting cache (frame rate: up to 12 fps / number of frames: up to 25 frames), Continuous H:120 fps (50 frames are captured at a speed of about 1/120 seconds or faster), Continuous H:60 fps (25 frames are captured at a speed of about 1/60 seconds or faster), BSS (Best Shot Selector), Multi-shot 16
monitor: 7.5 cm (3-in.), approx. 614k-dot, wide viewing angle OLED monitor with anti-reflection coating and 5-level brightness adjustment
media: Internal memory (approx. 65 MB) SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card
powersources: One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL12 (included) AC Adapter EH-62F (available separately)
focallength: 4.5-81.0 mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 25-450 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
aperture: Electronically-controlled ND filter (-2 AV) selection mode
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 110.1 x 60.3 x 30.7 mm (4.4 x 2.4 x 1.3 in.) (excluding projections)
suppliedaccessories: Camera Strap, Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL12 (with terminal cover), Charging AC Adapter EH-70P, USB Cable UC-E6, Audio Video Cable EG-CP16, ViewNX 2 CD, Reference Manual CD
filesystem: DCF, Exif 2.3, DPOF, and MPF compliant
construction: 12 elements in 10 groups (1 ED lens element)
focusrange: [W]: Approx. 50 cm (1 ft 8 in.) to infinity, [T]: Approx. 1.5 m (5 ft) to infinity Macro mode: Approx. 1 cm (0.4 in.) (at a wide-angle zoom position) to infinity (All distances measured from center of front surface of lens)
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor pre-flashes
fileformats: Still pictures: JPEG 3D images: MPO Sound files (voice memo): WAV Movies: MOV (Video: H.264/MPEG-4 AVC, Audio: AAC stereo)
focusareaselection: Face priority, center, manual with 99 focus areas, subject tracking, target finding AF
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Bengali, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
framecoverageplaybackmode: Approx. 100% horizontal and 100% vertical (compared to actual picture)
shootingmodes: Auto, Scene auto selector, Scene (Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Black and white copy, Easy panorama, Pet portrait, 3D photography), Night landscape, Night portrait, Backlighting, Special effects, Smart portrait
imagesensor: 1/2.3-in. type CMOS; approx. 18.91 million total pixels
digitalzoommagnification: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of approx. 1800 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
framecoverageshootingmode: Approx. 98% horizontal and 98% vertical (compared to actual picture)
isosensitivitystandardoutputsensitivity: ISO 125-1600 ISO 3200 (available when using Auto mode)
vibrationreduction: Combination of lens shift and electronic VR (still pictures) Lens shift (movies)
